    • varapproxr-exp-family

    varapproxr-exp-family

    varapproxr-exp-family.Rmd

    Exponential Family

    \[ \begin{aligned} f(y|\theta) &= c(\theta)h(x)\exp\left(\omega(\theta)^\top T(y)\right) \\ \ln f(y|\theta) &= \ln c(\theta) + \ln h(x) + \omega(\theta)^\top T(y) \\ f(y|\omega) &= c(\omega)h(x)\exp\left(\omega^\top T(y\right) \\ \ln f(y|\omega) &= \ln c(\omega) + \ln h(x) + \omega^\top T(y) \end{aligned} \]

    GLMM form for linear predictor \(\eta\), e.g. \(\eta = X\beta\) or \(\eta=X\beta + Z\gamma\), \[ \begin{aligned} \eta_i &= x_i^\top\beta + z_i^\top\gamma \\ \theta_i &= \theta(\eta_i) \\ \ln f(y_i|\eta_i,\phi_i) &= A(\phi_i)^{-1}\left(y_i\theta(\eta_i)-B(\theta(\eta_i))\right) + C(y_i, \phi_i) \\ \ln f(y|\theta) &= \sum_{i=1}^n \ln f(y_i|\theta_i) \\ \mathbb E[y_i|\theta_i] &= B^\prime(\theta_i) \end{aligned} \]

    Gaussian

    Multivariate Gaussian

    \[ \begin{aligned} p(y|\eta) &= \exp(\eta^\top T(y) - A(\eta) - d/2\ln(2\pi)) \\ T(y) &= \begin{bmatrix} y \\ y y^\top \end{bmatrix} \\ \eta &= \begin{bmatrix}\Sigma^{-1}\mu \\ -\frac{1}{2}\Sigma^{-1} \end{bmatrix} \\ A(\eta) &= -\eta_2\eta_1\eta_1^\top - \frac{1}{2}\ln|-2\eta_2| \end{aligned} \]

    Poisson
